changeSet.author: stessy
changeSet.sql: alter table prix_locomotion rename to travel_price

changeSet.author: stessy
changeSet.sql: alter table travel_price alter column PRIX_LOCOMOTION_ID rename to ID

changeSet.author: stessy
changeSet.sql: alter table travel_price drop column age_minimum

changeSet.author: stessy
changeSet.sql: alter table travel_price drop column age_maximum

changeSet.author: stessy
changeSet.sql: alter table travel_price drop column annee

changeSet.author: stessy
changeSet.sql: create sequence TRAVEL_PRICE_SEQ as bigint start with 100000 increment by 1

changeSet.author: stessy
changeSet.sql: alter table travel_price add SEASON_ID varchar(10)

changeSet.author: stessy
changeSet.sql: alter table travel_price add constraint travel_price_season_fk foreign key (SEASON_ID) references SAISON(SAISON_ID)
